page.title: 16Facilities in Elsworth
page.content:
Elsworth does not have a village hall as such, and the only hall available is at the school. Some members of the village would like clear links and both sides are looking into the possibility of its being designated a Community School.
There is concern that because of the cost of housing Elsworth is becoming an aging population. It appears to be losing its village identity as it becomes a commuter village with an independently mobile population.
We have just lost a small area of natural woodland in Fardell's Lane for building houses.
There is concern about the lack of facilities: no medical care, only two shops and very poor transport.
